property.caption: List entity
property.description: The type of object in the list

property.caption: Listener Reference
property.description: An optional reference from the context entity to listen to for the selection. Should be the same type as the list entity. If not selected, the widget will use the context entity.

property.caption: Data source MF (one)
property.description: An optional microflow to retrieve the object you want pre-selected. If not selected, the widget will use the context entity.

property.caption: Data source MF (list)
property.description: An optional microflow to retrieve a list of objects you want pre-selected.
